verses.name: Ezekiel 7:23
verses.text: Make a chain: for the land is full of bloody crimes, and the city is full of violence.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:24
verses.text: Wherefore I will bring the worst of the heathen, and they shall possess their houses: I will also make the pomp of the strong to cease; and their holy places shall be defiled.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:25
verses.text: Destruction cometh; and they shall seek peace, and there shall be none.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:26
verses.text: Mischief shall come upon mischief, and rumour shall be upon rumour; then shall they seek a vision of the prophet; but the law shall perish from the priest, and counsel from the ancients.
